item.description:
There are a few rooms left.  Sign up now for a relaxing and rejuvenating vacation!

Spend a week in Nantucket! We're renting a house in town!

This is a great time to go. It's still quiet there and affordable. Prices are double in July & August.

Saturday to Saturday, June 11 - 18, 2011

Browse the quaint shops, relax at the beach, go for a bike ride, scooter around the island, eat, drink, and have a great time with great people!

Please change the amount in the payment box when you RSVP to match your selection. 

$600 double occupancy ($300 per person for the entire week!)

$500 single per person for the entire week

$100 per person, per night (choose the number of nights you want to come)

Before you RSVP, email me at jackierg@comcast.net to check availability.

Linens and towels are provided.  Beach towels, coolers, chairs, umbrellas and

free high speed wireless internet, all included! There is a wash & dryer too so you can go home with clean clothes if you want.

Ferry Transportation Options

HYLINE FAST FERRY: http://hylinecruises.com/nan/high-speed.html

HYLINE TRADITIONIAL FERRY:  http://hylinecruises.com/nan/seasonal.html

Steamship Authority: http://www.steamshipauthority.com/ssa/documents/NT0524to09082011.pdf

Note that there is a $15 parking fee per car, per day.
item.name: Nantucket Vacation - You Can Still Sign Up
